title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Research agents in action: From complex business challenge to trusted insights
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 研究代理实战：从复杂业务挑战到可信洞察
abstract: What if your most challenging research tasks could be completed in minutes instead of weeks? That’s the power of Amazon Quick Research. Join us, along with Principal Financial Group, to see how Quick Research breaks down complex topics, pulling from your organization’s internal knowledge, web data, and premium third-party datasets to deliver comprehensive, source-verified insights. Explore diverse use cases—from market intelligence to risk assessments—and learn about the journey Principal took towards smarter research and decision-making.
abstract_cn: 如果您最具挑战性的研究任务能够在几分钟而非几周内完成，会怎样？这就是Amazon Quick Research的强大之处。与我们以及Principal Financial Group一起，了解Quick Research如何分解复杂主题，从您组织的内部知识、网络数据和优质第三方数据集中提取信息，提供全面且经过来源验证的洞察。探索从市场情报到风险评估等多样化用例，并了解Principal在实现更智能的研究和决策方面所走过的历程。
